code: import React from'react';import{Button,Box,Typography,Container}from'@mui/material';import{useNavigate,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import FlightIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Flight';import PublicIcon from'@mui/icons-material/Public';import TableViewIcon from'@mui/icons-material/TableView';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Homepage=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{flightNumber}=useParams();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{component:"main",maxWidth:"sm",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{marginTop:8,display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',alignItems:'center',background:'linear-gradient(180deg, #e0f7fa 0%, #80deea 100%)',padding:4,borderRadius:2,boxShadow:'0 3px 5px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.12)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{component:"h1",variant:"h4",gutterBottom:true,children:"Welcome to AirManage"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",color:"textSecondary",gutterBottom:true,children:"Your Flight Management Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mt:4,width:'100%'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableViewIcon,{}),variant:"contained",sx:{width:'100%',mb:2,bgcolor:'primary.light'},onClick:()=>navigate("/tabular-view/".concat(flightNumber)),children:"Tabular View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FlightIcon,{}),variant:"contained",sx:{width:'100%',mb:2,bgcolor:'secondary.light'},onClick:()=>navigate("/plane-view/".concat(flightNumber)),children:"Plane View"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{startIcon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PublicIcon,{}),variant:"contained",sx:{width:'100%',mb:2,bgcolor:'info.light'},onClick:()=>navigate("/extended-view/".concat(flightNumber)),children:"Extended View"})]})]})});};export default Homepage;
